Segment.name: MIS
Segment.comment: To provide information indicating status in mortgagee name, address, or name and address

Field.name: MortgageeInformationStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating mortgagee name and address information status

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: JurisdictionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the jurisdiction of the regional servicing office
